instructions: Power on the Coolpad Surf hotspot. On your Wi-Fi enable phone, search for available WiFi networks. Select the network name (SSID) that's listed on the label inside the back cover of the Coolpad Surf hotspot. Open a browser on your Wi-Fi enabled device and enter http://mobilehotspot or http://192.168.0.1 in the address bar. The Coolpad Surf Mobile Hotspot login screen will appear. Enter the Password in the field provided. The default password is "admin". Click Login . If the password is entered correctly, the Web User Interface screen appears.
